casebody.data:
Costin et al., Appellees, v. Consolidated Ceramic Products, Inc., Appellant.

[Cite as Costin v. Consol. Ceramic Products, Inc., 102 Ohio St.3d 1211, 2004-Ohio-1757.]

(No. 2003-0569 Submitted March 16, 2004 Decided April 21, 2004.) Lowe, Eklund, Wakefield & Mulvihill Co., L.P.A., and Mark L. Wakefield, for appellee Brian Costin. Weston, Hurd, Fallon, Paisley & Howley, L.L.P., and Shawn W. Maestle, for appellant.

{¶ 1} This cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently accepted.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur.
